verses.1: Tate aw, na pa uhʼ hong hilhnate ngai unla, thu na tel theih nadingun limtakin ngaihsun un.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh kong hilh thute thuhoih ahi hi. Kong hilhte khempeuh limtakin ciamteh un.
verses.3: Kei zong tapa khat neihsun ka hi a, naupang no khat ka hih lai-in
verses.4: ka pa in thu hong hilh a, “Ka thugente ciamteh inla, mangngilh kei in. Kong gen bangin gamta in; tua hileh na nungta ding hi.
verses.5: Pilna le thu ngaihsut theihna na neih nading hahkat in. Kong gen thute mangngilh kei inla, hoihtakin ngaihsun in.
verses.6: Pilna nusia kei in; tua hileh siatna panin nang hong hu ding hi. Pilna deih in; tua hileh lungmuang takin na om nadingin hong kem ding hi.
verses.7: Pilna na ngah nading a thupi masa pen hi a, na neih khempeuh na beilawh zongin na zon ding ahi hi.
verses.8: Pilna deih in; mi lianin hong bawl ding hi. Limtakin pom in; pahtawina hong ngahsak ding hi.
verses.9: Pilna in pahtawina le minthanna nangma tungah hong tungsak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.10: Ka ta aw, ka thugente limtakin zui in. Tua hileh na khansau ding hi.
verses.11: Na pil nading lampi kong hilh zo a, na gamtatzia ding kong gen zo hi.
verses.12: Hoihtakin gamta lecin nang hong nawngkaisak zo ding bangmah om lo dinga, na tai hangin zong na puk kha kei ding hi.
verses.13: Hong kihilhnate lencip inla, khahsuah kei in. Na nuntak nading ahih manin limtakin zui in.
verses.14: Migilote tawh kikhawl kei inla, amauʼ gamtatnate zui kei in.
verses.15: Amauʼ gamtat bangin gamta peuhmah keʼn! Gitlohna peel in! Paisan inla, na maban sem in.
verses.16: Migilote in a sia khatpeuh a sep mateng uh lum thei lo uh a, mi khatpeuh a suk zawh mateng uh ihmu thei lo uh hi.
verses.17: Gitloh gamtatna, annek bangin nuamsa uh a, ngongtatna, tui dawn bangin a ngaihsun uh hi.
verses.18: Ahi zongin thuman miteʼ zuih lampi ahihleh sun dong a taang pha semsem zingsang khuavak tung tawh kibang hi.
verses.19: Migiloteʼ lampi ahihleh zan khuamial bangin mial a, amaute a tuksak, a suih khakte nangawn mu thei lo uh hi.
verses.20: Ka ta aw, ka thugente don inla, ka kammalte ngai in.
verses.21: Na kiang panin pai khiasak kei inla, na lungsimah ciamteh in.
verses.22: Bang hang hiam cih leh tua thu a zuite in nuntakna le cidamna-in a nei uh hi.
verses.23: Na lungsim ngaihsutnate nuntakna nak hi a, na neihsa a manpha pen bangin na kep ding ahi hi.
verses.24: A man lo thu gen ngei kei inla, zuau thu le a kiza khial thei ding kammalte zang het kei in.
verses.25: Kisuanna nei het loin om liuliau inla, maizumin kuncip kei in.
verses.26: Na khatpeuh na sepna thu thei tel in. Tua hileh na nasep peuhpeuh maavang ding hi.
verses.27: Siatna peelin a manin gamta inla, thuman lampi panin themcik zong pial kha kei in.
